articles.content: Irene Mideva from Vihiga County in western Kenya lost two children in the space of three months in 2004. The cause of death in both cases was malaria, a mosquito-transmitted parasitic infection that … [+7656 chars]

articles.author: Mary West
articles.title: Gluten detox: Symptoms, effects, and how long it takes - Medical News Today
articles.description: A gluten detox involves removing all gluten from the diet. For some, it is hugely beneficial, but it also has some risks. Learn more here.
articles.content: Gluten is not a toxin, so it is not something a person needs to detox from. However, removing gluten from the diet is essential for people with celiac disease and may help people with gluten sensitiv… [+7573 chars]

articles.title: 5 uses of coconut oil other than hair care - Pulse Nigeria
articles.description: When a lot of people think about coconut oil, its use is usually directed towards hair care.
articles.content:
However, its potential goes far beyond just hair care. Here are five other uses of coconut oil other than for hair care.
